document.masterDocTitle: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

subSubSection.paragraph:
Berosus aculeatus LeConte. Clayton
:
Peck Cr. , Osterdock , CTH , 7/25/11;
Mitchell
: Cedar R ., St. Ansgar , CTH ,
7/5/2006
. Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north, Iowa , and Texas in the south
.

:
Cedar Hills Sand Prairie ( UV light), ELF, 6/19/12;
Butler :
Palmer Cr. , Greene , CTH ,
5/29/2007
;
Dubuque :
North Fk. Maquoketa R
.,
Dyersville , CTH
,
7/25/05;
Hancock
: East Branch Iowa R
.,
Goodell , JML, 10/17/00;
Henry :

.,

,

Cedar R
.,
Cedar Rapids , CTH
,
8/24/15;

Mud Cr. , Wilton , CTH
, 9/15/03. Distribution: Transcontinental in the USA .

Berosus pantherinus LeConte. Allamakee
:
Little Paint Cr., Harpers Ferry, CTH, 8/27/14; Cedar: Cedar R., West Branch, CTH, 9/12/06; Clinton: Brophy Cr., McCausland, CTH, 8/14/12; Johnson: Old Mans Cr., Hills, CTH, 9/18/13; Linn: Cedar R., Cedar Rapids, CTH, 9/19/13; Lucas: Wolf Cr., Chariton, TMM, 9/12/12; Muscatine: Cedar R., Conesville, CTH, 8/29/ 12; Polk: Des Moines R., Des Moines, CTH, 8/ 27/12; Wayne: Jordan Cr., Millerton, TMM, 8/ 24/12. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north, Nebraska , Missouri , and Texas in the south.
Bronson, TMM, 8/9/05. Distribution: Transcontinental in the USA .

Chaetarthria atra (LeConte)
.
Delaware :
Maquoketa R ., Dundee, MWB, 6/24/01. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to
Missouri and Iowa .

Chaetarthria pallida (LeConte)
. Johnson:
( Wickham 1911 ). Distribution: Primarily eastern USA , with isolated records in the west.

Cymbiodyta blanchardi Horn. Allamakee
:
French Cr., Churchtown, CTH, 9/16/04; Clayton: North Cedar Cr., Clayton, CTH, 9/2/15; Clinton: Elk R., Teeds Grove, CTH, 8/12/13; Dubuque: White Pine Hollow Cr., Luxemburg , CTH, 9/9/ 04; Fayette: Unnamed trib. to Volga Lake outlet, Fayette, CTH, 8/4/15; Mitchell: Burr Oak Cr., Osage, CTH, 8/3/11; Winneshiek: UV light, KR, 11/3/01. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Missouri and Iowa .

Cymbiodyta chamberlaini Smetana. Allamakee
:
Suttle Cr., Monona, CTH, 8/17/11; Clayton: Unnamed trib. to Volga R., Volga, CTH, 9/21/15; Delaware: Twin Springs Cr., Colesburg, CTH, 9/ 17/07; Dubuque: Catfish Cr., Dubuque, CTH, 7/ 28/95; Fayette: Unnamed trib. to Little Turkey R., St. Lucas, CTH, 9/28/11; Jackson: Storybook Hollow Cr., Bellevue, CTH, 8/29/07; Winneshiek: Middle Bear Cr., Highlandville, CTH, 7/17/07. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Wisconsin in the north, Iowa , and Kansas in the south.

Cymbiodyta minima Notman.
(Downie and Arnett 1996)
. Distribution: Northeastern USA , with Iowa forming part of the western border.

Cymbiodyta semistriata (Zimmermann)
. Davis:
Burr Oak Cr. , Troy , CTH , 6/1/15;
Van Buren :
Town Branch, Pittsburg, CTH , 7/29/14. Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to Wisconsin
in the north and Colorado .

Enochrus cinctus (Say)
. Davis:
Unnamed trib. to North Fabius R., Bloomfield, CTH, 7/15/13; Jackson: Farmers Cr., LaMotte, CTH, 8/8/07; Johnson: ( Wickham 1911 ); Van Buren: Fox R., Mt. Sterling, CTH, 7/16/13. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to South Dakota in the north, Kansas , and Texas in the south.

Enochrus collinus Brown. Black Hawk
:
Cedar Hills Sand Prairie (UV light), ELF, 6/19/12; Buchanan: Lime Cr., Brandon, CTH, 8/21/08; Henry: Little Potomac Cr., Mt. Pleasant, CTH, 8/7/15; Mahaska: Buck Cr., Barnes City, CTH, 7/26/12; Ringgold: Lotts Cr., Beaconsfield, JML, 6/21/06. Distribution: Northeastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north. Iowa forms the southwestern border of its range. New state record.

Enochrus consortus Green. Davis
:
Soap Cr. , Peach Ave. , CTH , 7/17/13; Linn: Wapsipinicon R ., Viola, DPH, 6/9/01; Louisa: Iowa R ., Wapello, MWB, 10/8/13; Muscatine: Pike Run, Nichols, CTH , 8/20/12;
Van Buren :
Shimek State Forest ( UV light), ELF, 5/18/12. Distribution : eastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north, Iowa , Missouri , and Louisiana in the south
.

Enochrus diffusus (LeConte)
. Howard:
( Wickham 1911 ). Distribution: Northwestern USA , extending east to Michigan .

Enochrus fimbriatus (Melsheimer)
. Johnson:
( Wickham 1911 ); Scott: ( Wickham 1911 ); Story: ( Wickham 1911 ; Gunderson 1967). Distribution: Transcontinental in the USA .

Enochrus ochraceus (Melsheimer)
. Allamakee:
Yellow R., Postville, CTH, 8/14/00; Black

Enochrus sayi Gundersen. Des Moines
:
Flint Cr., Danville, CTH, 7/15/03; Floyd: Cedar R., Carrville, CTH, 8/7/12; Jackson: Maquoketa R., Maquoketa, CTH, 9/13/12. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Iowa in the north, Missouri , and Texas in the south. Iowa forms the northwestern edge of the range.

Helochares maculicollis Mulsant. Buchanan
:
Wapsipinicon R., Independence, CTH, 8/6/12; Linn: Wapsipinicon R., Central City, CTH, 9/27/ 06; Louisa: Iowa R., Wapello, CTH, 10/15/03; Muscatine: Mud Cr., Wilton, CTH, 9/15/03; Scott: Wapsipinicon R., DeWitt, CTH, 8/30/ 12. Distribution: Northeastern USA , extending west to Missouri and Iowa .

Helocombus bifidus (LeConte)
. Black Hawk:
Cedar Hills Sand Prairie ( UV light), ELF, 6/19/ 12;
Howard :
( Wickham 1911 ). Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north, Iowa , and Missouri in the south
.

Hydrobius fuscipes ( Linnaeus)
. Black Hawk:
Cedar Hills Sand Prairie (UV light), ELF, 6/19/ 12; Jackson: South Big Mill Cr., Bellevue, CTH, 9/17/14. Distribution: Northern transcontinental in the USA , Iowa forms part of the southern border in the Midwest.

Hydrobius melaenus (Germar)
. Allamakee:
Clear Cr., Lansing, MWB, 8/16/07; Clayton: North Cedar Cr., Clayton, CTH, 9/24/07; Dubuque: Catfish Cr., Dubuque, CTH, 8/1/07; Fayette: Unnamed trib. to Volga Lake outlet, Fayette, CTH, 8/4/15; Winneshiek: North Bear Cr., Highlandville, CTH, 7/17/07. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Wisconsin and Iowa .

Hydrochara leechi Smetana. Winneshiek
:
Decorah, HFW, 7/20/33; (Downie and Arnett 1996). Distribution: Central USA , from North Dakota to New Mexico in the west, and Pennsylvania , Indiana , and Texas in the east
.

Hydrochara obtusata (Say)
. Hancock:
Pilot Knob Wetland, Forest City, MTF, 7/18/07; Linn: Cedar R., Cedar Rapids, CTH, 8/24/15. Distribution: Northern transcontinental in the USA , Iowa forms part of the southern border in the Midwest.

Hydrochara simula Hilsenhoff and Tracy. Jackson
:
South Big Mill Cr., Bellevue, CTH, 8/ 28/07. Distribution: Great Lakes region, with Iowa forming the southwestern border.

H. soror Smetana. Allamakee
:
Little Paint Cr., Harpers Ferry, CTH, 8/27/14; Appanoose: Sharon Bluffs State Park (UV light), ELF, 7/26/ 11; Black Hawk: Beaver Cr., Cedar Falls, MWB, 8/6/12; Butler: West Fk. Cedar R., Dumont, CTH, 10/11/99; Davis: Fox R., Moulton, CTH, 6/29/06; Decatur: UV lighting, ELF, 5/19/12; Jackson: South Big Mill Cr., Bellevue, CTH, 8/6/14. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Texas in the south, Oklahoma , Iowa , and Wisconsin in the north.

H. spangleri Smetana. Allamakee
:
Dousman Cr., Ion, CTH, 8/12/15; Clinton: Brophy Cr., McCausland, CTH, 8/19/14; Fremont: Waubonsie State Park (UV light), ELF, 6/22/12; Guthrie: Springbrook Cr., Guthrie Center, TMM, 7/16/13; Johnson: Pechman Cr., Hills, CTH, 4/17/17; Kossuth: Private Wetland, Algona, MTF, 7/14/08; Story: Bear Cr., Ames, TMM, 7/7/13. Distribution: Eastern, exclusive of extreme northeastern USA , extending west to Nebraska in the north and Texas in the south. Iowa forms part of the northern border in the Midwest.

Hydrophilus ovatus Gemminger and Harold. Johnson
:
( Wickham 1911 ).
Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Iowa in the north, Kansas , and Texas in the south. Iowa forms part of the northwestern border
.

Hydrophilus triangularis Say. Cerro Gordo
:
Private Wetland, Ventura, MTF, 7/20/07; Dickinson: Freda Haffner Kettlehole, Milford, MTF, 7/24/07; Franklin: Hampton, FHS,
9/5/ 1896
;
Fremont :
Sapp Bros. Truck stop ( UV light), ELF, 4/17/04; Greene: Snake Cr. , Rippey, MTF, 8/14/07; Johnson: State Hygienic Laboratory, Coralville, KJS, 5/20/13; Winnebago: Private Wetland, Thompson, MTF, 7/18/07; Worth: Shell Rock R ., Kensett, CTH , 10/15/02. Distribution : Transcontinental in the USA
.

Laccobius agilis (Randall)
. Madison:
North Branch North R., Winterset, CTH, 6/14/96. Distribution: Northern transcontinental in the USA , with Iowa forming the southern border in the Midwest.

Laccobius minutoides (Orchymont)
. Allamakee:
Upper Iowa R ., Dorchester, MWB, 9/11/13; Wayne: South Fk. Chariton R ., Corydon, TMM , 8/24/12. Distribution : Northeastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north and Kansas in the south. Iowa forms part of the western border
.

Laccobius truncatipenis Miller. Clayton
:
Bear Cr., Edgewood, MWB, 9/9/04; Fayette: Bell Cr., Clermont, CTH, 7/20/04; Harrison: Soldier R., Pisgah, JML, 7/11/00; Jackson: North Fk. Maquoketa R., Maquoketa, CTH, 9/16/13; Shelby: Unnamed trib. to West Nishnabotna R., Irwin, JML, 7/6/05; Winneshiek: South Pine Cr., Sattre, CTH, 8/27/14. Distribution: Northwestern USA , extending east to Michigan . Iowa forms part of the southern border in the Midwest.

Paracymus despectus (LeConte)
. Davis:
Fox R ., Moulton, CTH , 6/29/06. Distribution : Northeastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north and Kansas in the south. Iowa forms part of the western border
.

Sperchopsis tessellata (Ziegler)
. Allamakee:
Yellow R., Ion, CTH, 8/29/02; Buchanan: Pine

Tropisternus blatchleyi Orchymont. Appanoose
:
Little Shoal Cr., Cincinnati, CTH, 10/4/11; Clinton: Elk R., Teeds Grove, CTH, 8/6/07; Muscatine: Pike Run, Nichols, CTH, 8/20/12; Wapello: Des Moines R., Ottumwa, CTH, 10/7/ 13. Distribution: Eastern USA , with Iowa forming the northwestern border.
Van Buren: Des Moines R., Farmington, CTH, 9/6/06; Wayne: East Fk. Medicine Cr., Allerton, CTH, 8/11/05. Distribution: Southeastern USA , with Iowa forming the northwestern border.

Tropisternus columbianus Brown. Allamakee
:
Unnamed trib. Yellow R., Postvile, CTH, 7/24/ 07; Clayton: Brownfield Cr., Colesburg, CTH, 9/18/07; Muscatine: Pike Run, West Liberty, CTH, 7/19/06; Winneshiek: South Pine Cr., Sattre, CTH, 10/27/10. Distribution: Western USA , extending east to Ohio in the north and Texas in the south.
